content: **you ll love this adorable beanie pattern - sizes preemie - adult xl ** try the cozy pom pom beanie hat pattern this hat is beginner-friendly and works up quickly use a variegated yarn for variation or a solid neutral for a classic look **pattern highlights** // worked flat and then seamed together // written & video instructions included **sizes** preemie - adult xl **suggested yarn** i used hobby lobby i love this yarn in the shade after dinner laughs but any yarn will work **hooks used** i used a j 10/6 0 hook but you can make this pattern with any yarn and hook
